name.description: Name of the property linked with that token

decimals.description: Number of decimals that the token should display, 0 for non-fungible

details.description: Standardized details for the property description

type.description: Type of the property one of

rent/token/year.description: Estimated rent per year per token

description.description: Description of the property linked with that token

images.description: Array of URL to images for the property
